label: Richard Brent
description: I design and craft user interfaces for both hardware and software, with a focus on creating best user experience possible. I have specialized in user research, information architecture, wireframe, visual design and rapid prototyping in the UI/UX design field, as well as developing my expertise in HTML, CSS and JavaScript.With my passion for web front-end experience, Iâ€™m currently designing and developing websites for a research project at Georgia Tech. I like spending my spare time working on side projects and attending web development groups.

label: Bhargav Rajendra
description: For your really long charts, it supports scrolling. It can even do things on hover, click, and scroll for when someone accidentially interacts with your chart.You can also specify an optional class key in the data dictionary.
